plot: A newly hired intern at a major corporation experiences the dark side of his boss as he is dragged through a situation that could cost him his job, or worse, his soul.
title: Human Failing
plot_es: A newly hired intern at a major corporation experiences the dark side of his boss as he is dragged through a situation that could cost him his job, or worse, his soul.
plot_en: A newly hired intern at a major corporation experiences the dark side of his boss as he is dragged through a situation that could cost him his job, or worse, his soul.
